name: Will you escape ?
description:
Welcome everyone,

Our team decided to participate to a gamejam launch by the Youtuber named Mathieu https://www.youtube.com/mathieuYT . 

The theme of the gamejam was to create a original labyrinth gameplay. 

So now, let me you tell the story... During a space mission , a group of astronauts found a huge alien structure close to a sun. With an insane curiosity, to maybe discover a new intelligent life, our astronauts decided to enter to analyse and maybe find some secrets...
Now you will be one of our courageous astronauts and enter in this strange structure.

During this project, we learned a lot about modular assets and 3D games creation.

We hope you will like it and don't hesitate to give some feedback in comments. Have fun ;)
